oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DURABILITY OF ROCK ARMOUR ON COASTAL STRUCTURES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bradbury, A.P.
Allsop, N.W.H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: coastal structures
rock armor
armor durability
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper summarises many of the recent advances in the testing of rock quality for coastal structures. Advanced work on armour profile and armour unit shape descriptors is identified. A set of assessment methods for monitoring armoured slopes in the field are described, with examples drawn from recent monitoring exercises. The paper concludes by describing future directions of research in this field.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 20 (1986): Proceedings of 20th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Taipei, Taiwan, 1986.; 129
